mapper.insert: insert into UserAdditional(id, nickname, pic, description, zipcode, address1, address2, add_latitude, add_longitude, introduce, grade) values(#{id}, #{nickname}, #{pic}, #{description}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{add_latitude}, #{add_longitude}, #{introduce}, #{grade})
mapper.select: select case when (count(nickname) > 0) then true else false end as 'isNickDuplicated' from UserAdditional where nickname = #{nickname}
